meanings.definition: Presenting or sharing something together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: They copresented the project at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The two friends copresented a song at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The siblings copresented a magic trick that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The copresented idea sparked a wave of creativity in the group.
meanings.sent5: The copresented artwork captured the attention of everyone in the room.
